author: mrmitch
title: LEGO city needs Santa for the Holidays
review: Great hard to find set! Santa looks good and keeps the kids in LEGOTOWN happy(at least the good boys and girls). Get this set for the mini figure. So glad I was able to obtain it from Shop at Home years ago. This set is a must for any serious LEGO collector.  HO HO HO go LEGO - Buy it !

author: sethlee
title: the night before christmus
review: I think this set is very usefull the slaed is a perfect idea and even Santa's bag with presents everything in this set is fun to play with it shall be a exellent gift for christmus or the people who don't celebrate christmus.

author: pod120
title: The Perfect Stocking Filler!
review:
I spotted this at a Lego shop in December 2006 and I was with my parents as they were looking for gifts for a Christmas party. Just as we were leaving I asked if I could get it, but my parents said they had already chosen something. However 3 weeks later on Christmas Eve I received sets 7240 and 7896 and did not realise at first that this was also beneath the wrapping paper!

About the set, I love the background on the packaging, it improves the look of the set. The sleigh is a great design for a set from 1995 and this is the set that Lego City needs, Santa, His sleigh and the joy of Christmas!

author: MiklosRobert
title: Very good
review:
I have got this set direct from Lego factory.
I wrote to Lego a letter with my ideas in 1995 as I was 13 years old. After some weeks i got a big A4 format envelope with full of Lego Factory prospekts and this set.
I was very very happy becouse of it!

author: zipper
title: Great Christmas set!
review: The first time that I saw this set I knew that I had to have it. The santa minifig is really cool due to the beard and cap. Honestly, there isn't a lot to look at, but that doesn't matter when it's Christmas time and everyone is looking at the cool Christmas Lego set that you have out on display. It's easily worth the money.
